types.sample_quote: I saw them on my Ring camera around {time} and sent the clip to police.
I turned and she was gone; we called 911 immediately.
I saw a {vehicle} headed {direction} and called it in.
She left campus at {time} wearing a {tops} and {bottoms}.
Security pulled video showing a {suspect_desc} exiting with the child.
I think he just disappeared. Maybe he wandered off.
types.research_note: Caregivers may show false allegation indicators: evasion, equivocation, delayed reporting

types.sample_quote: My child is missing. Last seen at {time} wearing {clothing}.
types.research_note: Family members may provide immediate reporting with clear timeline (truthful) or show delayed/equivocal reporting (false allegation)

truthful_indicators: Provides clear sensory details and immediate timeline
false_allegation_indicators: Evasion when responding to dispatcher questions
Attempts to convince the dispatcher by repeating key phrases
Initial delay in speaking after call is answered
Extraneous information presented outside question context
Child last seen 'sometime earlier' with vague time
Reported disappearance time unclear or not provided
reporting_behaviors.call_duration: Call lengths ranged widely (39 seconds to ~16 minutes), but duration did not differ between truthful and false allegation callers.

high_reliability: Displays urgency and anxiety consistent with situation

sample_sentence_patterns: According to a {type}, the child was seen {activity} near {location}.
